argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rdgsucmpt.1 | |- F = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |
| 2 |  | rdgsucmpt.2 | |- ( x = ( F ` B ) -> C = D ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x A |
| 4 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x B |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x D |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5, 1, 2 | #P_rdgsucmptf | |- ( ( B e. On /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) |
